text: Michał Turkiewicz (25 November 1956 – 17 September 2021) was a Polish politician and teacher. He was born in Sulików, Poland. He was a member of the Polish United Workers' Party. He was a member of the Sejm from 2001 until 2005. Turkiewicz died on 17 September 2021 at the age of 64. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Polish politicians Category:Polish academics
title: Michał Turkiewicz
